metadata.description: Storypillar is a podcast for kids (ages 4-8) anchored in global stories and social-emotional skills. Join Sneak (an enthusiastic caterpillar), Bean (a tween butterfly), Sparky (a giant chicken), and Meg (a human person) as they tackle sticky social situations, explore stories from all over the world, and pick up great advice from listeners–like you! They also save plenty of time for laughing and being silly…so if you’ve got feelings, love stories, and are up for a fart joke or ten, Storypillar is definitely worth a listen.
metadata.author: Meg Lewis

translation.web_share_player_download_app_tip_deskto: Download the free Yoto App and scan this code
translation.web_share_player_download_app_tip_generi: Unlock a world of stories, music, activities, sleep sounds, podcasts and radio

translation.web_share_player_download_app_tip_nfc_ta: Download the free Yoto App and tap the card on your mobile
translation.web_share_player_download_app_title_add_: Want to add this card to your Yoto library?
translation.web_share_player_invalid_link_desc: It might contain a typo or is no longer available.
translation.web_share_player_link_preview_descriptio: Listen and add to your Yoto library
translation.web_share_player_not_found_heading: Uh oh, I’ve got a bad feeling about this...
translation.web_share_player_not_found_text: We can’t find the content you’re looking for. You might have followed an expired or invalid link.
translation.web_share_player_sharing_paused_desc: We’ve frozen this link because it may be breaking our <1>sharing policy</1>. The playlist’s creator can email hello@yotoplay.com to request a manual review.

translation.web_share_player_download_app_tip_nfc_ta: Téléchargez l'appli Yoto gratuite et tapez la carte sur votre téléphone pour l'écouter
translation.web_share_player_download_app_title_add_: Souhaitez-vous ajouter cette carte dans votre audiothèque ?

translation.web_share_player_not_found_heading: Aïe, aïe, aïe… Ça, on ne l’avait pas prévu !
translation.web_share_player_not_found_text: Nous ne trouvons pas le contenu audio que vous cherchez. Vous avez peut-être ouvert un lien invalide ou un lien expiré.
translation.web_share_player_sharing_paused_desc: Nous avons gelé ce lien car il pourrait enfreindre notre <1>politique de partage<\/1>. Le créateur du contenu peut nous contacter sur bonjour@yotoplay.com pour revoir le contenu.
